VIWHBleBaseCB - Interface in android.viwave.com.viwhble
callback interface is used for CentralManager (as Server) 1. receiving BLE device scan result
2. monitor BLE state change
3. monitor connection state change
merge 3 delegate: scanDeviceDelegate, deviceStateDelegate, connectionDelegate to ONE
